data.description: Design of commercial interiors with emphasis on design process, programming, space planning, selection of interior materials, furniture, and lighting. Field trip required.
data.title: INTERIOR DESIGN III

data.description: Design of commercial interiors with emphasis on acoustics, codes, costs, specifications, details, and visual presentation. Field trip required.
data.title: INTERIOR DESIGN IV

data.description: Understanding and applying the process of solving design problems of interiors. Space planning; selection and use of furnishings and materials; preparation of presentations.
data.title: INTERIOR DESIGN I

data.description: Design of residential interiors including space planning, lighting design, selections of materials and furniture, professional communication of design solutions. Emphasis on the aesthetic and functional needs of the family and residents with special needs.
data.title: INTERIOR DESIGN II

data.description: Elements and principles of design relevant to design of the visual environment.
data.title: DESIGN: FUNDAMENTALS I

data.description: Elements and principles of three-dimensional design relevant to design and analysis of the spatial environment.
data.title: DESIGN: FUNDAMENTALS II
